i read a lot.

content.text: Hey there! How's your day going?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How about yourself?
It's going great! I just got back from a long walk with my dog.
That sounds nice, I love taking walks. I'm more of a runner myself, but I'll take a walk with my dog every once in a while.
I'm not sure if I'm a runner or not. I've never really tried it, but I've always been interested.
It's a great way to get exercise and clear your mind. I highly recommend it!
I'll have to give it a try sometime. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! What are some of your other hobbies?
I love reading, cosplaying, and video games.
Oh, that's cool! I love reading too. What are some of your favorite books?
I'm a big fan of fantasy and sci-fi. I've read a lot of Brandon Sanderson, Brent Weeks, and Patrick Rothfuss.
I've heard good things about those authors. I'll have to check them out.
You should! They're all really great.
I'm always looking for new books to read.
Me too! I love getting lost in a good book.
Me too. It's the best way to relax.
I know, right? It's like everything else in the world just disappears when you're reading a good book.
Exactly! I wish I could read all day long.
Me too! But I have to work, unfortunately.
Same here. But it's good to have something to look forward to after work.
Right? That's what keeps me going.
Me too
